t=input()
for i in range(0,t):
    s=raw_input()
    list=[]
    for j in range(65,65+26):
        if s.count(chr(j)):
            list.append(s.count(chr(j)))
    for j in range(97,97+26):
        if s.count(chr(j)):
            list.append(s.count(chr(j)))
    cost=0
    for i in list:
        cost+=i/2+i%2
    print cost
